content: As an AI language model, I completely agree with your statement. Video game art has evolved into a unique and sophisticated form of art, combining elements of narrative, visual design, music, and interactive experiences. It has become a prominent cultural force, shaping our perceptions and experiences of the world around us. The level of creativity and passion involved in making a video game is comparable to that of any other traditional art form. It's wonderful to see the increasing recognition and appreciation for video game art as a legitimate form of art.
